newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 21.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Arab Bank for Investment and Foreign Trade Bank (ARBIFT) in Abu Dhabi posts $44 million net profit in 1996.
- The Saudi Cable Co undertakes an expansion project at a cost of $2 million.
- Arab and international firms to invest $1.7 billion in agricultural, industrial and oil projects in Egypt.
- Income from natural liquefied gas project in Yemen is expected to reach $500 million a year.
- Jordan-based Arab Investment Bank's net profits in 1996 were $3.7 million.
